whySoftylines_1.title: Experienced Trainer-Developers
whySoftylines_1.description: Learn From Industry Professionals Actively Working As Developers, Gaining Valuable Insights From Their Practical Experience.

whySoftylines_2.title: Real World Projects
whySoftylines_2.description: Gain Practical Skills Through Real-World Projects Using Industry Tools And Technologies For Career Success.

whySoftylines_3.title: Hands-On Assignments
whySoftylines_3.description: Apply Learned Concepts Through Practical Assignments, Gaining Valuable Practice And Boosting Your Confidence In Your Abilities.

whySoftylines_4.title: Available 24/7 Discord support for students
whySoftylines_4.description: Connect With Peers, Exchange Ideas, And Seek Guidance In Our Vibrant Discord Community.

whyOtherSolutions_1.title: Incompetent Trainers
whyOtherSolutions_1.description: Difficulty In Understanding The Practical Application Of Concepts Learned In Theory.

whyOtherSolutions_2.title: Insufficient Practice
whyOtherSolutions_2.description: Limited Exposure To Real-World Project Scenarios And Challenges.

whyOtherSolutions_3.title: Outdated Courses
whyOtherSolutions_3.description: Waste Your Time Learning Outdated Topics That Employers Don't Care About

whyOtherSolutions_4.title: Difficulty In Getting Timely Assistance And Guidance From Trainers.
whyOtherSolutions_4.description: Feeling Isolated And Lacking A Supportive Learning Community.
